page.title: 06Population in South Bradford
page.content: The approximate{population}of South Bradford is{40,000(1981 Census)}and the majority of these people live North of the Ring Road in East and West Bowling.The population South of the Ring Road is mainly{indigenous}and this is reflected in the table below.The northern half is composed of a mixture of races but the largest {ethnic minority}is the{Asian } community.The Asian people are mainly from Pakistan and originally came to Bradford to work in the textile mills. { {SCHOOL INDIGENOUS ASIAN OTHERS E.Bierley First 75 0 0 Holme Middle 342 6 2 St.Matthews First 142 78 1 Ryan Middle 131 159 32
